oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-01-09 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on January 9, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Mary Lou; Dick Reinhart; Cimarron Kids; Hiram Higsby; Lem Hawkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (0:40) Opening theme and statements / (1:50) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (2:06) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Spanish Two-Step" / (3:23) Allan Page, Mary Lou, and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (3:56) Mary Lou performs "I’m Going To Have A Cowboy Wedding" / (5:54) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (5:59) Dick Reinhart performs "San Antonio Rose" / (8:13) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (8:29) The Cimarron Kids perform "Wanderers Of The Wasteland" / (11:37) Allan Page introduces the next song / (11:52) Hiram Higsby performs "Peg Leg Jack" / (13:42) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" and Allan Page announces the show title [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Reinhart, Dick; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
